description: Makes plots to check MCMC convergence using rwty for two MCMC chains
name: rwtyMulti
script:
library("rwty")
library("cardoonTools")
library("ggplot2")
library("gridExtra")

td<-tempdir()

write.table(tree_data_run1, file=paste(td, "/temp_run1.trees", sep=""), sep="\t", row.names=F, quote=F)
write.table(tree_data_run2, file=paste(td, "/temp_run2.trees", sep=""), sep="\t", row.names=F, quote=F)

write.table(log_data_run1, file=paste(td, "/temp_run1.log", sep=""), sep="\t", row.names=F, quote=F)
write.table(log_data_run2, file=paste(td, "/temp_run2.log", sep=""), sep="\t", row.names=F, quote=F)

rwty_trees<-load.trees(td, format="revbayes")


rwty_analysis<-analyze.rwty(rwty_trees)
likelihood_trace<-cardoonPlot(rwty_analysis$Likelihood.trace$trace.plot, width=1000, height=500, res=100)$png
autocorrelationPlot<-cardoonPlot(rwty_analysis$autocorr.plot, width=1000, height=500, res=100)$png


all_variables<-colnames(rwty_trees$ptable)[-(1:4)]
nvar <- length(all_variables)
#if(nvar>12) nvar=12

tracePlotList<-list()
densityPlotList<-list()
for(i in 1:nvar) {
  tracePlotList[[i]]<-rwty_analysis[[paste(all_variables[i], ".trace", sep="")]]$trace.plot
  densityPlotList[[i]]<-rwty_analysis[[paste(all_variables[i], ".trace", sep="")]]$density.plot
}

nplotcol<-3
nplotrow<-ceiling(nvar/nplotcol)

tempplotfile=paste(td, "/temp.png", sep="")
ggsave(tempplotfile, device="png", width=10, height=15, dpi=150, marrangeGrob(tracePlotList, ncol=nplotcol, nrow=nplotrow))

bytes <- file.info(tempplotfile)$size
tracePlots <- base64enc:::base64encode(readBin(tempplotfile,"raw", n = bytes))

ggsave(tempplotfile, device="png", width=10, height=10, dpi=150, marrangeGrob(densityPlotList, ncol=nplotcol, nrow=nplotrow))

bytes <- file.info(tempplotfile)$size
densityPlots <- base64enc:::base64encode(readBin(tempplotfile,"raw", n = bytes))


grid.draw.gg <- function(x) {
  print(x)
}

ggsave(tempplotfile, device="png", width=5, height=5, rwty_analysis$Chain.1.correlations)
bytes <- file.info(tempplotfile)$size
correlationPlots <- base64enc:::base64encode(readBin(tempplotfile,"raw", n = bytes))

all_splitsfreq_plots<-list(
rwty_analysis$splitfreqs.sliding.plot,
rwty_analysis$acsf.sliding.plot,
rwty_analysis$splitfreqs.cumulative.plot,
rwty_analysis$acsf.cumulative.plot)

ggsave(tempplotfile, device="png", width=10, height=10, dpi=150, marrangeGrob(all_splitsfreq_plots, ncol=2, nrow=2))
bytes <- file.info(tempplotfile)$size
splitsfreqsPlot <- base64enc:::base64encode(readBin(tempplotfile,"raw", n = bytes))

all_treespace_plots<-list(
  rwty_analysis$treespace.heatmap,
  rwty_analysis$treespace.points.plot
)
ggsave(tempplotfile, device="png", width=5, height=10, dpi=150, marrangeGrob(all_treespace_plots, ncol=1, nrow=2))
bytes <- file.info(tempplotfile)$size
treespacePlots <- base64enc:::base64encode(readBin(tempplotfile,"raw", n = bytes))




unlink(td)
